pl.wiraszka.ZwirekSpaceInvaders

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.wiraszka.ZwirekSpaceInvaders.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends Object

    Controller in Zwirek Space Invaders

    MVC Controller module for the game.
    • Start running View and Model.
    • Start and close game.
    • User interaction event handler.
    Author:
    Maciej Wiraszka

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean begin
      True before player starts the game.
      private Model gameModel
      Game MVC component Model.
      private View gameView
      Game MVC component View.
      private boolean inGame
      Defines if game is running.
      private boolean pressedSpace
      To avoid multiple space-actions during one space-key press.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(View gameView,
                  Model gameModel)
        Controller constructor.
        • Initiate class fields
        • Set this controller in other MVC components.
        • Set start screen in View
        Parameters:
        gameView - MVC View of the program
        gameModel - MVC Model of the program

    • Method Detail

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e)
        KeyEvent handler. Handles program steering gained from user when he or she presses a key.
        Parameters:
        e - event type sent from action listener in JPanel.

      • keyReleased

        public void keyReleased(KeyEvent e)
        KeyEvent handler. Handles program steering gained from user when he or she releases a key.
        Parameters:
        e - event type sent from action listener in JPanel.

      • isInGame

        public boolean isInGame()
        Getter of private field inGame.
        Returns:
        inGame value

        Setter of private field inGame.
        Parameters:
        b - value to set

      • endWinGame

        public void endWinGame(boolean win)
        Ends game, initiates proper screening of the game result.
        Parameters:
        win - true if player won the game, false if aliens won the game
